ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Greetings fellow Questers (beastlord + PoJ)
ygData.msgSnippet: Mostly I group with a warrior, bard and cleric from my guild. I managed to ding 54 last night. The mobs do hit fairly hard but not as bad as PoN. I haven t
ygData.messageBody:
Mostly I group with a warrior, bard and cleric from my guild. I managed to ding 54 last night. The mobs do hit fairly hard but not as bad as PoN. I haven't seen any of the planes where it would be a good spot for soloing. My favorite spot to play right now is in the arena in Kael xp isn't bad and there is a chance of getting the drops needed for Thurg armor quests if you are doing those. PoG is another good spot for getting loot and some nice armor drops for some classes if you are not worried about losing faction in the elven cities. 4 kills in PoG are enough to completely trash your faction in parts of both kelethin and Felwith. My guild has a lot of fun raiding Howling stones as well there are some good drops there and the xp is pretty decent. Though in all of these places you need at least one full group and sometimes a small raid to have good luck.
 
Woradin 54 beastlord
----- Original Message -----
From: Dorfl
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Thursday, April 24, 2003 6:03 PM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Greetings fellow Questers (beastlord + PoJ)

Hi, just a quick question =)
 
Did you solo or group in PoJ? I've grouped in PoN a few times and I wouldn't even think about trying to solo there at 53, after seeing how hard the mobs hit. So is PoJ any easier?
 
Thanks
______________________________________
Dorfl - 53 Beastlord - Torvon
http://www.magelo.com/eq_view_profile.html?num=452875
 
----- Original Message -----
From: Earl Seekins
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Wednesday, April 23, 2003 11:46 PM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Greetings fellow Questers

With my beastlord I did lvls 14- 16 in the throneroom in Crushbone, 16 - 25 in PC hunting Recondite bandits, 25 -30 in South Karana hunting avaiks and Tesch Mas gnolls. 30 - 35 in either FM or HHK basement, 35-40 in the Overthere, 40 -44 in Great Divide XP wasn't real great but built up my faction for the Prayer shawl quests and Thurg armor quests 44- 50 in the DLs and KC and have been doing POJ and Kael Drakkel up to my current level up 53.
 Woradin SwyftClaw  53 Beastlord
